alert.note: Alert for Southern Hills, Albion Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 1:24PM MST until January 21 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches, except 2 to 8 inches on ridge tops and elevations above passes. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph, especially for mtn ridges. * WHERE...Albion mtns, Almo, Elba, Conner summit. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 5 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. Expect blowing and drifting snow in higher elevations.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
